protocol_title: Expansion of Human Pluripotent Stem Cells as Aggregates in Suspension Culture Using mTeSR™3D
notes: This protocol describes the expansion of human pluripotent stem cells (hPSCs) in a three-dimensional suspension culture system using mTeSR™3D. It provides detailed instructions on materials, reagents, and methods for culturing and passaging hPSCs.
expected_sections: Expansion of Human Pluripotent Stem Cells as Aggregates in Suspension Culture Using mTeSR™3D
5.0 Initiating hPSC Suspension Culture in mTeSR™3D
6.0 Culturing hPSC Suspension Aggregates Using mTeSR™3D
7.0 Passaging Suspension Culture hPSCs Grown in mTeSR™3D
12.0 Appendix 3: Differentiating Suspension Cultures into Three Germ Layers
15.0 Appendix 6: Dissociating Aggregates to Single Cells for Flow Cytometry

critical_values.description: Concentration of Y-27632 for optimal aggregate formation

Incubation time for aggregates with GCDR
